author: Vikki Blake
title: GameStop to Double-Down on 'High Margin Potential' Trading Cards, Pokémon TGC and the Like a 'Natural Extension of Our Existing Business'
description: GameStop CEO Ryan Cohen has said the company will double-down on "high margin potential" trading cards, with Pokémon TGC and the like a "natural extension of its existing business."
content:
GameStop
 is doubling-down on trading cards.
In its 2025 Annual Meeting
, CEO Ryan Cohen told shareholders that the company had seen its first profitable opening quarter since 2019 due to "reducin… [+3080 chars]
